overview: The 1997 AVN Starlet and Performer of the Year, Missy, shares her most intimate fantasies and desires. She'll take you on an erotic journey straight into her "Heart & Soul". Experience her lust for life in a mind blowing three-way, and a jaw-dropping anal/DP scene with four studs that can only be described as spectacular. Talk about the beast within, watch as she becomes a snarling animal in a fantastic all-girl orgy that'll leave you breathless. Taking over a year in the making, Missy's been involved in every aspect of the movie, from conception to final editing. So watch "Heart & Soul"; Missy's own masterpiece.
title: Heart & Soul
